page.title: 11CHILDREN'S LEISURE
page.content: Most boys play football on the corner of the street, in the road or in a field ,the age group can range from 4-40,if they can't play football they watch it.The age group can range from 5-80 when watching football on the television.Another leisure aspect is BMXing _ bicyles used for stunts and racing.In school,tag is a very popular game which involves running and trying to make people the tag. Girls play skipping or catching a ball.Many clubs are held in{SOUTHHILL. Discos are popular for a night out , with an age range of {10-15}years. On average they are open from{ {7.00pm-10.30pm.}Youth clubs are good for sports like snooker ,table tennis or rounders.Listening to pop music {(RADIOS,CASSETTES AND RECORDS)}is very popular at night.
